case_vignette: A 9-year-old girl is brought to the pediatrician by her mother who is concerned about a new rash. Her daughter is otherwise feeling well, is up to date on vaccinations, and has not traveled recently. The family lives in an old apartment building. She is currently excelling in school and has many friends. Physical exam is notable for the finding in Figure A.
